message: Let's start fair. I'll take most of the money now, but we can work out a more even split later if you want to keep playing.
The first offer was far too lopsided.  I'm willing to give you a chance for a more even split later, but this is much fairer.
Okay, let's try this.  I'm still losing money with each round, so I need to get more than 3000 to make it worthwhile. This is a fair compromise.
We're getting close.  I'm willing to come down a bit, but I need a bigger share to account for the risk of us running out of rounds.
Let's split it down the middle.  We're both losing money at this rate, so a 50/50 split is the best way to make sure we both get something.
